20101228010240.000|20101228010243.000|CC1|CHARGE.

20101228010246.000|20101228010246.000|CC1|THE WESTMINSTER COURT THIS

20101228010257.000|20101228010300.000|CC1|PART OF AND OTHERS.

20101228010303.000|20101228010305.000|CC1|NAME, AGES AND ADDRESSES.

20101228010308.000|20101228010309.000|CC1|THEY HAD BEEN CHARGED WITH

20101228010327.000|20101228010328.000|CC1|TESTING INCENDIARY MATERIALS.

20101228010413.000|20101228010415.000|CC1|THE WHITE HOUSE TODAY SAID THE  
20101228010415.000|20101228010416.000|CC1|U.S. WAS DEEPLY CONCERNED ABOUT 
20101228010416.000|20101228010418.000|CC1|THE CONVICTION.

20101228010429.000|20101228010431.000|CC1|>> A FORCED SMILE FROM MIKHAIL  
20101228010431.000|20101228010433.000|CC1|KHODORKOVSKY DID NOT HIDE THE   
20101228010433.000|20101228010436.000|CC1|STRAIN AS HE WOULD -- AS HE WAS 
20101228010436.000|20101228010438.000|CC1|BROUGHT INTO COURT IN HANDCUFFS.

20101228010441.000|20101228010443.000|CC1|SPENT SEVEN YEARS IN PRISON,    
20101228010443.000|20101228010443.000|CC1|MUCH OF IT IN SIBERIA.          
20101228010443.000|20101228010446.000|CC1|HE SAYS THE REAL REASON BEHIND  
20101228010446.000|20101228010447.000|CC1|HIS PROSECUTION IS THAT HE DARED
20101228010447.000|20101228010448.000|CC1|TO SPEAK OUT AGAINST THE

20101228010454.000|20101228010459.000|CC1|MOTHER TOLD ME THAT IF THE JUDGE

20101228010501.000|20101228010502.000|CC1|POLITICAL PRESSURE, HE WOULD

20101228010909.000|20101228010911.000|CC1|DECLARED EMERGENCIES.           
20101228010911.000|20101228010913.000|CC1|WE HAVE THIS REPORT FROM        
20101228010913.000|20101228010915.000|CC1|WASHINGTON.                     
20101228010915.000|20101228010917.000|CC1|>> IF YOU WANT TO KNOW WHY THE  
20101228010917.000|20101228010918.000|CC1|NORTHEAST OF THE U.S. SEES THAT 
20101228010918.000|20101228010921.000|CC1|OVER THE LAST 24 HOURS, JUST

20101228011809.000|20101228011815.000|CC1|TWO PEOPLE.                     
20101228011815.000|20101228011817.000|CC1|>> POLICE AND BOMB DISPOSAL     
20101228011817.000|20101228011818.000|CC1|EXPERTS ARRIVED WITHIN MINUTES  
20101228011818.000|20101228011821.000|CC1|OF THE ALARM BEING GIVEN IN     
20101228011821.000|20101228011822.000|CC1|DRUMS AND THE ORDER.

20101228011836.000|20101228011838.000|CC1|WE IMMEDIATELY REFORMED
